description: NVIDIA camera firmware contains a difficult to exploit vulnerability where a highly privileged attacker can cause unauthorized modification to camera resources, which may result in complete denial of service and partial loss of data integrity for all clients.

product.name: Jetson AGX Xavier series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson TX2 series, Jetson TX2 NX, Jetson Nano, Jetson Nano 2GB, Jetson TX1

enisaIdProduct.product_version: All Jetson Linux versions prior to r32.6.1
